hero.title: Create Cinematic Seedance Video with seedance2-two
hero.description:
seedance2-two lets you generate high-quality seedance video from text or images with multi-shot storytelling and synchronized audio.
Build scenes faster with natural motion, flexible ratios, and creator-ready seedance video output.
hero.tip: seedance2-two supports text-to-video and image-to-video seedance video workflows.

introduce.title: What is seedance2-two?
introduce.label: Overview
introduce.description: seedance2-two is an AI seedance video generation platform that helps teams turn prompts and images into cinematic clips quickly with powerful seedance video tools.

items.description: Generate coherent multi-scene seedance video with consistent characters and visual style from a single prompt.

items.description: Describe a scene in natural language and produce cinematic seedance video clips with smooth motion and lighting.

items.title: Image to seedance video control
items.description: Upload a reference image and animate it into short seedance video while preserving composition and tone.

items.title: Fast creator workflow
items.description: Iterate quickly with seedance2-two reusable prompts and practical defaults for social, product, and marketing seedance video content.

benefits.title: Why teams choose seedance2-two

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about seedance2-two
faq.description: Need help planning your first seedance video? Contact us by email.

items.question: What is seedance2-two?
items.answer: seedance2-two is an AI-powered seedance video generator for creating cinematic clips from text or image inputs.

items.question: Does seedance2-two support both text and image inputs?
items.answer: Yes. You can start from a prompt for text-to-seedance-video or upload a still image for image-to-seedance-video generation.

items.question: Can seedance2-two create multi-scene seedance video?
items.answer: Yes. seedance2-two is designed for multi-shot storytelling so one generation can include coherent scene changes in your seedance video.

items.question: Is audio synchronization supported in seedance2-two?
items.answer: seedance2-two supports synchronized audio and lip-sync style output for more natural seedance video results.

items.question: What seedance video formats can I export?
items.answer: seedance2-two lets you generate seedance video assets for common use cases such as landscape, portrait, and square workflows.

items.question: How can I get seedance2-two support?
items.answer: Email us at support@seedancetwo.com for seedance2-two setup and customization questions.

cta.title: Launch your first seedance2-two seedance video experience
